node.title: An Attitude of Gratitude
node.description: Thanksgiving is a wonderful time of year! But God desires Thanksgiving to be a lifestyle, not just an event or holiday. The apostle Paul urged just this type of a perpetual attitude of gratitude.  While in Philippi Paul in dramatic fashion not only talked the talk of a grateful spirit, but walked the walk as well. By God’s grace we can enjoy a thankful spirit regardless our circumstances.
